caravanning_page.title: Caravanning – Freedom on Wheels!
caravanning_page.subtitle: Discover the unique combination of freedom, comfort and adventure
caravanning_page.intro_text: Caravan travel has become an increasingly popular way to explore the world in recent years. It offers a unique combination of freedom, comfort and adventure that traditional forms of travel simply cannot provide. Imagine having your home always with you – wherever you park, you are at home.
caravanning_page.benefit_2_desc: Your own bed and kitchen always with you
caravanning_page.independence_text: One of the greatest advantages of a caravan is complete independence. You don't have to follow hotel or restaurant opening hours, you don't have to book accommodation in advance. You can set off spontaneously, according to your current mood or weather. If you like a place, simply stay longer. If something doesn't appeal to you, continue on – without stress and restrictions.
caravanning_page.quote_1: Wherever you park, you are at home.
caravanning_page.comfort_text: A caravan provides comfort that every family will appreciate. You have your own bed, your own bathroom, kitchen, refrigerator and storage space. You don't have to pack and unpack suitcases at every location, everything is always at hand. Children can take their favorite toys, and every family member has their privacy.
caravanning_page.savings_text: You can cook your own meals, sleep in nature or at campsites, and visit more places in less time.
caravanning_page.ecological_text: Caravan travel is also more ecological than flying and allows you to discover lesser-known places off the tourist trails. You can wake up by a lake, have lunch with a mountain view, and park by the sea in the evening – all in one day. Thanks to the caravan, every trip becomes a personal story full of experiences that you would never have in a hotel.
caravanning_page.quote_2: You can wake up by a lake, have lunch with a mountain view, and park by the sea in the evening – all in one day.
caravanning_page.lifestyle_text: Finally, the caravan lifestyle encourages slowing down and returning to simpler values – time spent with family, connection with nature, and a sense of true freedom. It's an adventure that will teach you to be flexible, grateful, and open to the world.
caravanning_page.closing_text: If you've never traveled by caravan before, perhaps now is the right time to try it. Just start the engine, and the journey begins!

rv_detail_content.main_title: Luxury RV – The perfect choice for unforgettable adventures
rv_detail_content.intro_text: Looking for the perfect way to experience freedom on the road without compromising on comfort? We present our luxury RV, equipped with the latest technologies, offering everything you need for a comfortable and safe journey.

driving_features.title: Powerful and comfortable driving features:
driving_features.feature1: 165 HP engine and 8-speed automatic transmission for a smooth and dynamic ride.
driving_features.feature2: Electric parking brake for easy parking.
driving_features.feature3: Adaptive cruise control that maintains a safe distance from other vehicles.
driving_features.feature4: Automatic cabin air conditioning and automatic body air conditioning DOMETIC FJX4 2200, for maximum comfort on hot days.

external_equipment.title: External equipment:
external_equipment.feature1: 4.5-meter THULE awning, which provides pleasant shade.
external_equipment.feature2: FIAMMA Black bike rack for 4 bikes, with a load capacity of 60 kg.
external_equipment.feature3: Reversing camera with 12'' multimedia system supporting Apple CarPlay and Android Auto.

interior_comfort.title: Comfortable and spacious interior:
interior_comfort.feature1: Front electric bed for 2 people (126x196 cm).
interior_comfort.feature2: Rear XXL bed for 2-3 people (220x200 cm).
interior_comfort.feature3: Pull-out bed from the seat (103x206 cm).
interior_comfort.feature4: Electric windows and mirrors for easy operation.
interior_comfort.feature5: 24'' LED SMART TV with Android and WiFi connection.

energy_independence.title: Energy independence and sustainability:
energy_independence.feature1: LIFePO4 100Ah battery and 400W solar panel system with MPPT controller.
energy_independence.feature2: Charging the starter battery directly from the solar panel system.
energy_independence.feature3: TRUMA COMBI gas heating with integrated boiler and CP Plus panel.
energy_independence.feature4: WINTER package with waste water tank heating and frame insulated windows.

practical_equipment.title: Practical equipment:
practical_equipment.feature1: Clean water tank: 100l/20l for maximum autonomy.
practical_equipment.feature2: Large refrigerator with a capacity of 160l.
practical_equipment.feature3: DOMETIC cabin window blinds for complete privacy.
practical_equipment.feature4: XL entrance door with window and trash can.
practical_equipment.feature5: LED awning lighting for a pleasant evening sitting.

complete_equipment.title: Complete equipment for your comfort:
complete_equipment.text: Our RV is fully equipped with everything you need for a comfortable stay – plates, cutlery, all kitchen utensils for cooking, tools, outdoor table with chairs. We hand you the keys, and you set the direction. You don't have to bring anything with you, just get in and enjoy the ride.
